name: Vairina Esperaridea
effect: [overDress]－"Trickstar"[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if it [overDress], put all "Trickstar" and cards with the [overDress] ability from your drop as this unit's originalDress. [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your vanguard attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], [Stand] this unit, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each of this unit's originalDress.
flavor: Preparations all good! Let's rev it up~!

name: Chakrabarthi True Dragon, Mahar Nirvana
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, if you have a unit in the [overDress] state, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000. [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put a card with "Nirvana" in its card name from your hand or soul into your drop], choose a grade 0 from your drop, call it to (RC), choose one of your opponent's vanguards, and if your opponent's damage zone has four or less cards, deal one damage.

name: Trickmoon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on your back row center (RC) from drop, [Counter-Charge 1].[DressBoost] - [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, the boosted unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle for each card your "Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra" is Armed with.
flavor: You being here, is something outside of expectations.

name: Diabolos, "Unrivaled" Bruce
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the start of your ride phase, until end of turn, you "Final Rush". [AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you are in "Final Rush", [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 5], [Stand] all of your front row units, and this unit gets drive -2 until end of turn.

name: Desire Devil, Bubetsuu
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your other rear-guard is put into your soul by your vanguard's ability during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your hand, call it to an open (RC), and if your soul has ten or more cards, draw a card. (May be used even if this unit is put into your soul at the same time as other units)
flavor: You're suspicious! I shall arrest you on my authority!

name: Brainwash Swirler
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [Soul-Charge 1].[AUTO](RC):When your card is put into your soul by [Soul-Charge], if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. (+10000 if [Soul-Charge 2])

name: Aurora Fierce Princess, Seraph Purelight
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1 card with "Seraph" in its card name], your opponent chooses two cards each from their hand, rear-guards, and soul, and imprisons them in your Prison. [CONT](VC):During your turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 for every two of your opponent's cards imprisoned in your Prison. If ten or more cards are imprisoned, all of your front row units get [Critical] +1.
flavor: You "saw it" as well, right? That's what it means, after all.

name: Cardinal Draco, Masurea
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Retire a Shadow Army token], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If this ability was activated for the third time this turn, this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Gravidia Bacubirito
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a Meteorite card from your drop, and put it into your Order Zone.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your opponent's rear-guard was retired this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and if three or more were retired, it gets [Critical] +1.
flavor: The multi-colored will-o'-the-wisps gathered, secretly guarding its still hidden body.

name: Hellblast Full Dive
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and call it to (RC). Then, if you are in "Final Rush", all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Bizarre Beast, Bagumotor
effect: [ACT](RC):If one or less of your opponent's cards are imprisoned in your Prison, [COST][[Rest] this unit], choose a unit card from your opponent's drop, and imprison it in your Prison.

name: Form up, O Chosen Knights
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1]!Perform all of the effects below according to the number of your grade 3 units. ・2 or more - Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. ・3 or more - Draw a card. ・4 or more - Choose one of your vanguards, and it gets drive +1 until end of turn.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Koocy
effect: [CONT]:This card cannot be ridden, and can only be called to the back row center (RC).

name: Spiritual Body Condensation
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]!Choose a card with grade equal to or less than your vanguard from your drop, call it to (RC), and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Chakrabarthi True Dragon, Mahar Nirvana
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, if you have a unit in the [overDress] state, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000. [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put a card with "Nirvana" in its card name from your hand or soul into your drop], choose a grade 0 from your drop, call it to (RC), choose one of your opponent's vanguards, and if your opponent's damage zone has four or less cards, deal one damage.

name: Diabolos, "Unrivaled" Bruce
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the start of your ride phase, until end of turn, you "Final Rush". [AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you are in "Final Rush", [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 5], [Stand] all of your front row units, and this unit gets drive -2 until end of turn.

name: Aurora Fierce Princess, Seraph Purelight
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1 card with "Seraph" in its card name], your opponent chooses two cards each from their hand, rear-guards, and soul, and imprisons them in your Prison. [CONT](VC):During your turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 for every two of your opponent's cards imprisoned in your Prison. If ten or more cards are imprisoned, all of your front row units get [Critical] +1.

name: Apex-surpassing Sword, Bastion Prime
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +2000.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle your drive check revealed a grade 3 or greater card, [COST][put a card with "Bastion" in its card name from your hand or soul into your drop], [Stand] all of your grade 3 rear-guards, and they get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast Emperor, Magnolia Elder
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), choose a card from your soul, and you may call it to (RC).[CONT](VC):If you have one or more cards in your soul or on your (RC) with "Magnolia" in their card names, all of your rear-guards can attack and intercept from the back row, and get [Power] +5000.
